pages.text: $(li)Bolloom Buds can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/end/poise_forest)Poise Forests$(/l).$(br)$(li)After being pollinated by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/the_endergetic_expansion/puff_bug)Puff Bug$(/l), they bloom producing $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/endergetic/bolloom_fruit)Bolloom Fruits$(/l).
